title: Only t204 Collins left....price lowered to $60!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Only t204 Collins left....price lowered to $60!!
posts.post_content:
Parting ways with this group to better focus on some of my other projects. I'd always prefer a trade and cards I'm needing are listed below. This is a lowgrade, yet surprisingly attractive group of cards due to several of them having paper stuck to the back. This would give someone interested in t204s a good opportunity to start collecting this set. Offering them up as one lot for $850 or would trade for cards I need below. Scans are available upon request. Thanks in advance,
 
Brian
[URL="redmaccie@hotmail.com"]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/URL]
 
T204s....
 
Bridwell PR-FR -- looks great on front w/ no heavy creases and sharp corners. Lots of residue stuck to the back
Kleinon PR-FR -- front looks great with one corner wrinkle. Back has paper stuck to it
McLean GD-VG -- a couple tiny wrinkles...sharp corners....clean back
Lindaman PR-FR -- creasing across middle...clean back
Dorner PR-FR -- terrific looking front...paper stuck to back
Criger FR -- mild staining, "dents" on front...clean back
Jimmy Collins PR -- borders trimmed off, paper stuck to back
Schulte FR-GD -- creasing
Evers PR -- borders trimmed off, paper stuck to back
Nichols SGC 30 -- solid card, one wrinkle towards bottom
 
 
 
--------------------------
 
Cards I'm needing -
 
e90-3 commons - any

w590 (need 1) - Spencer
 
w517 minis (need 5) - Collins, Grove, T.Jackson, Miller, O'Doul
 
w553 (need 5) - Blue, Foxx, Maranville, Miller, Traynor
 
e103s commons - need any
 
d311s (need 5) - Daley, Delhi, Lewis, Maggert, Wares
 
e98 commons - need any
 
t210 orange borders - need any
 
eunc orange borders - need any common
 
1911 Baseball bats - need all
 
1918 Zeenuts - need any
 
1919 Zeenuts (need 7) - Lane (oak), Pinelli (sac), Prough (sac), Vance (sac), Seaton (SF), Snell (SF), Arbuckle (Vern), Meusel (vern)
 
1909 Obaks (need 32) - Bernard, Berry, Boyce, Brashear, Breen, D. Brown, Byrnes, Coy, Delmas, Fisher, Fitzgerald, Gandil, Graham, Guyn, Harkins, W. Hogan, Howse, C. Lewis, J. Lewis, McCredie, Mott, Nagle, Olson, Ornsdorff, Reidy, Ryan, Shinn, Speas, Stovall, Wiggs, Willett, J. Williams
brian contact ray holmes last i checked he was trying to put some t204s together.

I have a few t204s left available for the prices below. I'll also trade for anything on my wantlist above. Thanks much!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]


Bridwell PR-FR -- looks great on front w/ no heavy creases and sharp corners. Lots of residue stuck to the back -- $80 [SOLD]
Kleinon PR-FR -- front looks great with one corner wrinkle. Back has paper stuck to it - $80 [ON HOLD]
Dorner PR-FR -- terrific looking front...paper stuck to back - $80 [SOLD]
Jimmy Collins PR -- borders trimmed off, paper stuck to back - $75

Just one t204 left out of this group....it's the t204 Jimmy Collins that has been trimmed down.  Price lowered down to $70...

Thanks,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=35808&d=1301623372[/IMG]

Price now down to $60. Easy way to cross a HOFer off your list if you're working on a set...

Thanks!
Brian
